[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@visualization-tools/core](./core.md) &gt; [AGlAttribute](./core.aglattribute.md)

## AGlAttribute class

Wrapper for dirty checked GL attributes with VAO and shared mutable buffer support. `ChangeId`<!-- -->s must be generated program wide to avoid collisions `IncrementingIdentifierFactory` (rc-js-util) is a suitable implementation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class AGlAttribute implements IGlAttribute 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IGlAttribute](./core.iglattribute.md)
